alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 24 at 4:55PM CST until January 24 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Tornado Warning for... South central Beauregard Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 454 PM CST, a tornado producing storm was located just east of starks , moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic storm will be near... Buhler around 515 PM CST. De Quincy around 520 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
